summary: Senior digital account leader with extensive experience managing global digital projects and cross-functional teams for major brands; expertise in strategy, analytics, CMS, CRM, UX, and online marketing.

experience.title: Digital Client Lead
experience.description: Lead a technology-centric account for ExxonMobil; spearhead strategy and project leadership in ExxonMobil's Next Gen Global Web development efforts; manage cross-functional team (UX, Search, Analytics, Technology, Creative, PM); deliver agency POVs; post-launch site operations and optimizations; manage User Database Marketing and email strategy; budget tracking; projects include ExxonMobil Next Generation Web Developments, User Database Marketing, Search, Analytics, Site Content Management.

experience.title: Digital Account Director
experience.description: Managed digital strategy, creative and production process in partnership with a traditional account team; contributed to a 2015 digital plan (~$3M) across web, social, CRM, digital media, PR; consulted Restasis analytics and reporting; proposed web optimization plans to improve user conversions; assisted in recruiting subject matter experts; facilitated RFPs and new business pitches; Projects: Website Development and Optimization; rEVO iPad App; Omniture Reporting; Google Analytics; SEO; Paid Search; Banners; Emails.

experience.title: Digital Account Supervisor
experience.description: Led and managed the Land Rover online businesses and integrated digital campaigns; hybrid role blending account management and digital production; coordinated with developers and tech teams; built client relationships; established US as an international pilot with UK team; managed end-to-end digital projects; developed annual scope; supervised Account Executives; ensured quality; Projects: Range Rover Sport â€“ Race The Sun; Immersive Film Mobile Apps; Land Rover Owner's App; In-Control Car Integration; Digital banners; CMS SDL Tridion.

experience.title: Integrated Account Supervisor
experience.description: Led multi-brand campaigns (Kohl's, Nasdaq, Verizon, Novartis Reclast); managed end-to-end digital efforts; integrated with traditional work streams; maintained client contact and partnership; budget management; produced campaign analyses quarterly; mentored junior staff; Projects: Social Media apps, engagement games and contests; Campaign integrations across TV, Radio, Print; Rich Media banners; Websites; CMS SDL Tridion.

experience.title: Digital Account Executive
experience.description: Developed campaign strategies using emerging technology and social media; managed all account functions and creative process; presented ideas in client discussions; fostered strong client and vendor relationships; prepared project scopes, briefs, timelines and budgets; Projects: Digital experiences (Mobile App, AR, Touchscreen eDetail); Social Media campaigns; Websites, Banners, Emails; CRM; US and global digital projects.

experience.title: Integrated Account Executive
experience.description: Led integrated account between digital and CRM; supported team and clients; developed market insights and competitive analyses; managed communications between teams, clients, partner agencies and vendors; produced budgets and forecasts; Projects: Websites, Banners, CRM, Emails, Direct Mail, SEO, Print Ads.
